name: 施青良
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
詳細課程實施細則，請參閱
https://sites.google.com/site/ntutshih
Reading 1
Gore, Al. "Nobel Lecture on Global Warming."
Reading 2
Davidson, Jennifer. "My Carbon Footprint: A Documentary, a Daughter, and All That Is Dear."
Reading 3
Traister, Rebecca. "Return of Brainless Hussies."
Reading 4
Rosen, Christine. "Virtual Friendship and the New Narcissism."
scorePolicy:
除了學校規定的統一會考之外，另包含下列幾個項目：
專題報告　　　Presentation 20%
兩次複習小考　2 review tests  30~35%
課堂練習　　　In-class exercise and participation 45~50%
materials:
Goshigarian, Gary. The Contemporary Reader. 10th Edition. New York: Longman, 2010.

Williams, Joseph M. Style: Ten Lessons in Clarity and Grace. 8th Edition. New York: Longman, 2005.
